alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hancock; Taliaferro (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 3:55PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Hancock, southeastern Greene and southwestern Taliaferro Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 355 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Sparta, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Greensboro, Sparta, Crawfordville, Union Point, White Plains, Siloam, Liberty, Springfield, Veazey, Robinson, Daniel Springs, Powelton, Shoulderbone, Alexander Stephens Park and Lyneville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
